intro: Rocky, a brave little dog, embarks on a nighttime adventure to recover something very special. Along the way, he discovers that heroism comes in all sizes.
description:
Join Rocky in this visual novel, a brave and curious puppy, on an incredible nighttime adventure full of magic and excitement!

When something very special goes missing, Rocky doesn't hesitate for a second to embark on a mission to get it back. Throughout his journey, he'll discover that courage has no limits and that, although we may not always be the biggest or strongest, we can all be heroes. With unexpected friends and mysterious challenges along his way, Rocky will learn that true heroism lies in small acts of love, bravery, and dedication.

Story Features:

·Enchanting main character: Rocky, a brave and cuddly puppy, who inspires children to be brave and always do their best.

·A magical nighttime adventure: A story full of mystery, surprises, and exciting moments that capture the imagination.

·Valuable lessons: Teaches children that true heroism comes in all shapes and sizes, and that anyone can make a big difference.

·Unexpected Friends: You'll meet new friends who help Rocky on his journey, showing children the importance of friendship and collaboration.

·Guaranteed Fun: With a perfect blend of tenderness, emotion, and humor, children will be hooked on every page!

This is a perfect story to inspire little ones to be brave, kind, and never give up, no matter how big or small you are.
Because we can all be heroes; it just takes a little courage and a lot of heart.
